nodes.documentation:
A Smart contract including multiple Vaults identifiable by ID
Every Vault has the possibility of storing multiple ERC20 tokens
Don't send tokens directly to this contract using transfer or your funds may be lost, instead, use deposit.
Inspired by AragonOS Vault https://github.com/aragon/aragon-apps/blob/master/apps/vault/contracts/Vault.sol
nodes.name: Vault

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "only owner can set the contract address"

arguments.value: only owner can set the contract address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only owner can set the contract address"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the address of the Bank smart-contract, so that transfers can be authorized
@param _balanceContractAddress Bank smart-contract address*
nodes.name: setBankContractAddress

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can close the vault"

arguments.value: Only the owner can close the vault

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can close the vault"

vaultIsClosed
vaultIsOpen
deposit
transfer
balance
bountyPoolAmount
